NGUYEN CHI THANH (Mr.) 
Mobile phone:                          Email:  
“Nothing is certain except for the need to have great people”. I believe the key for any business success is to 
manage how organization works from a people and a culture perspective. Therefore, I always work to enhance 
and bring the best experience and values to my team, my clients, and community, to inspire confidence and 
empower for changes. I also believe good results must come from good processes. 
Education background 
•
2013: Project Management Professional (PMP), PMI, USA 
•
2012: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting and Auditing, University of Economics HCMC 
•
2011: Certified Information System Auditor (CISA), ISACA, USA 
•
2007: Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics and Informatics, University of Natural Sciences HCMC 
Other training courses: Trusted Advisor; Fraud Risk Management; Investigation training; Advisory and 
Consulting Core Skills; Project Management; and Portfolio Management; Information Risk Management; and 
other Leadership training courses. 
Employment history 
June 2017 – present: KPMG Vietnam and Cambodia – Manager, Chairman and CEO’s Office 
-
Leading business transformation project such as M&A, innovative technology, agile office, etc. to achieve 
business goals and objectives. 
-
Facilitating business strategy development and implementation with all Partners and management team. 
-
Facilitating business planning and operations for all functions to ensure business strategy is aligned. 
-
Leading Corporate Affairs. 
-
Leading Corporate Citizenship and business sustainable development programs. 
-
Sample project: new digital platform (web + mobile application) for offering new services to clients 
o
Leading the business model from definition to execution, including market strategy and 
operations. 
o
Leading and leveraging the resource of other functional teams to implement project activities, 
including designer and technical developer teams. 
o
Leading and collaborating with suppliers / partners for the project execution. 
o
Monitoring the project and reporting to Chairman and CEO. 
June 2016 – Jun 2017: KPMG Vietnam and Cambodia – Manager, People-Performance and Culture 
-
Leading HR transformation from manual and administrative support to be more effective HR function as 
business partners and consultants to close the function gaps and enable business strategy and vision. 
-
Leading all people’s initiatives including but not limited to Employer branding, Recruitment, Training and 
Development, People Engagement, and Performance Management. 
- 
Leading daily operations of People function (Recruitment, Learning and Development, Engagement). 
September 2014 – May 2016: Prudential Vietnam Assurance – Compliance Manager 
- 
Assisting Head of Compliance to build the right compliance culture to enable business strategy, including 
awareness training programs and other initiatives. 
- 
Developing policies and control frameworks and oversight business operational risk related matters and key 
compliance indicators (including operational risks indicators) 
- 
Maintaining controls to prevent, detect and investigate frauds from happening, and response to fraud 
incidents 
- 
Planning and executing compliance reviews to provide reasonable assurance over daily operations to the 
Managements 
- 
Consulting and successor for Business Continuity and Information Risk Management Manager 
July 2008 – September 2014: KPMG Vietnam and Cambodia – Assistant Manager, Management 
Consulting 
Project Advisory services: 
- 
Building and maintaining client relationship, and performing pre-sale and sale activities 
- 
Leading and working with combined regional and local teams of professionals to market and deliver a range 
of advisory services to clients on business transformation programs and projects including business 
restructuring, business processes improvement, risk management and new IT systems implementation and 
integration across manufacturing, insurance, real estate, and retails industries. 
IT Assurance services: 
- 
Working with Financial Audit teams to identify IT controls and assess IT environments to give reasonable 
assurance over the IT systems’ operations. 
- 
Advise the management team for risk mitigation and controls improvements opportunities over current IT 
environment and system controls 
References (details as on request)
